custom-sql.sql: SELECT ed.*, pd.*, emp.*, eskill.* FROM empdetails ed INNER JOIN emp_personal_details pd ON ed.employeeNo = pd.employeeNo INNER JOIN employee emp ON pd.employeeId = emp.employeeId LEFT JOIN (SELECT *, group_concat(skillId SEPARATOR ', ') as skillIds FROM emp_skill GROUP BY employeeId) AS eskill ON emp.employeeId = eskill.employeeId WHERE (?=0 OR ?=-1 OR ed.employmentstatusId = ?) AND (?=0 OR ?=-1 OR ed.titleId = ?) AND (?=0 OR ?=-1 OR eskill.skillId = ? OR eskill.skillIds like ?)
